trans-unit.source: Represents the data in a SOAP request sent or a SOAP response received by an XML Web service client at a specific <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表 SOAP 要求傳送或接收由 XML Web 服務用戶端在特定的 SOAP 回應中的資料<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""> </xref> SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的 HTTP 要求標頭欄位。

trans-unit.source: The Action property is available in any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: [動作] 屬性可用於任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""> </xref> SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的 HTTP 要求標頭欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the client proxy class, which derives from <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體的用戶端 proxy 類別，衍生自<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Client property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端屬性可以存取任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間

trans-unit.source: An instance of the client proxy class.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端 proxy 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a representation of the method prototype of the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: 取得 SOAP 要求適用的 XML Web 服務方法的方法原型的表示法。

trans-unit.source: Although the MethodInfo property can be accessed during any stage, the method information is only available during <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 MethodInfo 屬性可以存取任一階段，方法資訊<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間才可用

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> representing the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref>代表 SOAP 要求適用的 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the client waits for the server to finish processing an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在用戶端等待伺服器來完成處理 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> applied to an XML Web service method or XML Web service client can specify whether the XML Web service method is one way by setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> property of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>套用到 XML Web service 方法或 XML Web 服務用戶端可以指定 XML Web 服務方法是否是一種方式，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A>屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The OneWay property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間存取 OneWay 屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client does not wait for the server to completely process a method.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用戶端不會等待伺服器完全處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來與 XML Web 服務通訊的 SOAP 通訊協定版本。

trans-unit.source: When an XML Web service supports SOAP version 1.1,.NET Framework clients communicate with an XML Web service in that version by default.
trans-unit.target: 當 XML Web service 支援 SOAP 1.1 版時，.NET Framework 用戶端進行通訊與 XML Web 服務在該版本中預設值。

trans-unit.source: For details on how to change the version of the SOAP protocol, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何變更的 SOAP 通訊協定版本的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML Web 服務的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The Url property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間存取的 Url 屬性

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務的 URL。
